channel.title: Locus RSC [Hamachi - Open Daily - Not 24/7 - Best!] [IMAGES!]
channel.description:
LocusRSC
*CLIENT DOWNLOAD* http://uppit.com/v/0ZO43JF8
****************************
Yes.. Its using hamachi, because I use Wireless network. I cant host with No-Ip.. Maybe in future :/
Hamachi Networks:
[code]locusrsc locusrsc1 locusrsc2 locusrsc3 locusrsc4
PASSWORD IS 123 FOR ALL[/code]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2jb4nt5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2gwdkls.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/34zgc48.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/200tvmb.jpg[/img]
[b]Features[/b]
::help shows all commands ::news displays Latest Updates
-Dueling 100% -Wilderness PKing! -Crystal Chest! (::chest) -Good Skilling Areas -Exp. Rate 200x -Good Drops -Good Money Making -Buy Dragon Square Shield with ::dsq command (Costs 10M Coins) -Buy Super Set with ::pots command (Costs 30K Coins)
[b]Start with 1000GP, ALL Characters can get 100K from Admin for FREE![/b]
[b]Updates[/b] ::Arrows -Command ::Secret -Command, This will be changed to ::Event -New Drops from these Monsters: [code]-Black Demon -Black Knight Titan -HellHound -Chicken -Man -FireGiant -King Black Dragon[/code]
MUCH MORE..COME AND SEE!

item.title: Locus RSC [Hamachi - Open Daily - Not 24/7 - Best!] [IMAGES!]
item.dc:creator: @_A_mpd [A]mpd
item.description:
@_A_mpd wrote:

This looks quite good, so far.

Good work, I’m going to try this server, soon.

Although, why are you using Hamachi? Port forwarding isn’t difficult at all. I suppose that it wouldn’t make any difference if you’re using EasyRSC, but most people can’t be bothered to download Hamachi.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @badness badness
item.description:
@badness wrote:

[quote=“meatstick, post:7, topic:278361”][quote author=badness link=topic=367371.msg2783504#msg2783504 date=1242327340]
I know how to portforward.
But if you read whole message you migth notice

[quote]Yes… Its using hamachi, because I use Wireless network.
I cant host with No-Ip…[/quote]

It looks like I cant.
Ports are forwarded, and I tried to use uTorrent thing too but it just doesnt work.
Its about my new router. Forwarding worked before I changed my router to new one.

Just Download Hamachi, Its small file.
You migth need it in future

Im Trying to get much players online tomorrow, and have HUGE Drop party!
[/quote]
You can portforward even though you have wireless? lol[/quote]

Read full topic
